name: Wp extended Post type
author: appgenixinfotech

sections.description:
Wp extended Post type provides an easy to use interface for registering and managing custom post types and taxonomies for your website.

After creating the custom post type and taxonomies you are able to create or add new custom fields for generated CPT.
– You can add text, number, selection, and date picker for your CPT.

Use the Wp extended Post type plugin to take full control of your WordPress edit screens & custom field data.

Wp extended Post type Plugin turns WordPress sites into a fully-fledged content management system by giving you all the tools to do more with your data.

Credits

Wp extended Post type

sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

Visit Plugins > Add New
Search for “Wp extended Post type”
Install and Activate Wp extended Post type from your Plugins page
Click on the new menu item “WP Extended PostType” and create your first custom post type
sections.faq:
What kind of support do you provide?

Support Forums. Our Community Forums provide a great resource for searching and finding previously answered and asked support questions. You may create a new thread on these forums, however, it is not guaranteed that you will receive an answer from our support team. This is more of an area for developers to talk to one another, post ideas, plugins and provide basic help.

short_description: Wp extended Post type helps you to add custom fields to custom post type also add the custom post type and their descriptions.
